entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is mentioned as a person who is present in the conversation. He says 'Well, they'll never replace brooms in Britain, will they?'

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is mentioned as a person who is present in the conversation. He has sharp eyes and wants to have a word with Mr. Weasley about Ali Bashir.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is mentioned as a person who chokes into his cup.

entities.description: George Weasley is mentioned as a person who chokes into his cup.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as a person who busies himself with the kettle and gives Mr. Crouch a cup.

entities.name: ali bashir
entities.description: Ali Bashir is mentioned as a person who wants to have a word with Mr. Weasley about his embargo on flying carpets.

entities.name: arthur weasley
entities.description: Arthur Weasley is mentioned as a person who has an embargo on flying carpets.
